result.execSummary:
Michael John Berg was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Michael John Berg was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael John Berg

records.addlTxt: Notice of Completion of Case Letter

08:36 AM Defendant Michael John Berg in court with attorney Ellen Denise Craker.  Defendant Michael John Berg in custody.  Mark Adam Fruehauf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Att Craker- client will waive extradition
Court questions defendant
Defendant waives extradition, signs form
State signs form
Court finds he has waived extradition, signs form.
Att Craker - On 21CF537 plea to ct 1, dismiss ct 2. Time served sentence
State 73 days jail, 55 days credit
Defendant pleads no contest to ct 1
Court questions defendant, finds plea is voluntary, judgment entered on count 1, count 2 is dismissed. 
State recites criminal history
Att Craker makes statement
Court orders 73 days jail, 55 days credit, time served. Court costs, 120 days to pay or payplan

09:03 AM Defendant Michael John Berg in court with attorney Ellen Denise Craker.  Defendant Michael John Berg in custody.   Anne Terrien appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls case. Craker defers to defendant. Defendant indicates whatever is in his best interest he will go with. Court questions state on when he was taken into custody. Court sets new extradition date.  Extradition hearing scheduled for February 7, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

09:18 AM Defendant Michael John Berg in court, in custody.  Mark Adam Fruehauf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Michael John Berg appeared by video means.
Court questions defendant
Defendant requests attorney
Court sets for adjourned extradition date
  Extradition hearing scheduled for January 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
